name: Flying Cobra - Special Edition [Commodore 64]
description:
Flying Cobra - Special Edition is a fully enhanced  vertical scrolling shoot 'em up for your Commodore 64, which is crammed-packed with full presentation and pure explosive action from the SEUCK master, himself, Alf Yngve. 

War has broken out by an evil Dictator for some time. The world sent many of their armed forces to try and put an end to this carnage, but nobody got out alive.

As our last attempt to save the the world from complete chaos. We have assigned you as chief commander of the Flying Cobra. Your mission is to fight back at the enemy forces on land, sea or by air. Your Flying Cobra is armed with state of the art weaponry. This can penetrate any military vehicle or personnel when used correctly.  Can you reach Mexico airport and capture the evil Dictator and get him arrested, or will the country be taken into the wrong hands?

Good luck pilot!

Controls
Joystick port 2

Run/Stop - Pause Game
Q (While paused) - Abort game and return back to the front end

Credits
Game design, graphics and sound effects by Alf Yngve (Created using the Shoot Em Up Construction Kit)

SEUCK Redux Framework source by Martin Piper
Additional code, charset and music by Richard Bayliss

Freeload tape loader source by Paul Hughes

(C) 2020 The New Dimension
(Coming as a browser game and free download in January 2021)
